name: fit-factory

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix nodejs" "npm run dev --prefix react-app"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix react-app && npm run build --prefix react-app
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix nodejs" "npm run dev --prefix react-app"

description: Fitness application for tracking meals/nutrition,  workout progress, and viewing workout plans. https://fit-factory-web.herokuapp.com/
